Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 81st overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2010...
Injured on 5/8/2012 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/10/2013...
Had first career hit on 4/22/2013, off Jerry Blevins (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/30/2016, off Rick Vanden Hurk (STL)...
Struck out 17 batters against Pittsburgh on 5/20/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/29/2019, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2019, going 6-0, 1.19...
Injured on 5/10/2019 with a Broken Hand, out for 5 weeks...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2020...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2021...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Struck out 15 batters against Chicago (A) on 7/15/2022...
Injured on 8/31/2022 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 5 weeks...
